name: Weak Soul
description:
It's an adventure all about one goal: slaying demons. Every time you go on a journey, you have to choose among a myriad of options. Explore an unfamiliar cave, go into battle against demons, or search for the mysteries of this world? Don't forget that you will have to take responsibility for your actions...





  • With each step, make a fateful choice that leads you to your goal.
  • Don't be afraid to fight demons to the death.
  • Choose your play style, your class and your skills.
  • Buy or create equipment, artifacts, and potions to survive.
  • Find new settlements and people willing to help you.
  • Change the fate of this world or be consumed by evil.





Weak Soul tells the story of a medieval continent that has been invaded by demons. The action takes place in a post-apocalyptic dark fantasy world. Various events will be along your way to exploring the world. Don't help anyone, engage in robbery and be selfish, or increase your karma for good deeds, expecting good fortune in accomplishments.

On the way to the goal you will have to kill countless demons, die often and suffer in pain. But very few are able to endure and reach the end...
